entry.title: CDEvents updated
entry.content:
So my ‚Äúold‚Äù framework CDEvents turned two and a half less than a month ago üéâ and today it got updated to a whooping version 1.2.0. This brings the power of ARC and blocks (which have been in the develop branch for quite some time). It also raises the OS X deployment target to 10.6 and drops support for the now deprecated garbage collection.

Thanks to JustSid, tonyxiao and dwlnetnl for their contributions and helping to squash some bugs as well as improve the framework.

You can get it from its GitHub page, rastersize/CDEvents, and the API documentation has been updated.

(The project is still licensed under the MIT license.)
